summary: An upgraded version of my Tier Harribel follower mod.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u]THIS MOD IS NOT DEAD! I AM WORKING ON PUTTING TOGETHER A PROPER TEAM SO THAT PROGRESS MAY SPEED UP GREATLY! IF YOU WISH TO APPLY, SIMPLY MESSAGE ME WITH A LIST OF YOUR SKILLS AND WE CAN GO FROM THERE! UNTIL THEN, UPDATES WILL BE FEW AND FAR BETWEEN! PLEASE BE PATIENT!
[/u][/b]
I've upgraded my Tier Harribel Follower mod to include custom spells, perks, a shout, weapons, and enchantments. 

So me and my brother were talking about Bleach and the subject turned to favorite Espada. His is Starrk, and mine is Harribel. I was playing Skyrim at the time so I got the idea to make a Harribel follower, and here she is. 

Her hair is from the Apachii Sky Hair mod so you'll probably need that unless you don't mind a bald Harribel. 

You can find her right outside Riverwood along with a chest containing all her unique spells and weapons. She has her own custom class and she levels with the player. 

This is my first Skyrim mod ever so I hope you like it! 

If anyone would like to use this in their mod or improve upon this mod, simply credit me and send me a link! ;D

PLANNED FEATURES:
Questline to explain how Harribel got to Skyrim and to help her get back(in progress)
Harribel's Zanpakuto(playable/in progress)
Weapon enchantments that fire the spells upon swing(playable/in progress)
Voiced dialogue
Other Espadas
More spells,perks, and enchantments(in progress)
Custom armour
Resurreccion transformation power(somewhat playable/in progress)
Playable Hollow Race(somewhat playable/in progress)
Make it so Harribel gradually weakens and you are required to give her Reiatsu to sustain her
Hollow Race Evolution(in progress)
Custom Zanpakuto after evolving into Arrancar(in progress)
Wholes/Pluses
Unique Arrancar Final Boss w/ Resurreccion(in progress)
Hollow Enemies(in progress)
Hollow race must consume Reiatsu to evolve further
Relationship levels with Harribel to determine whether she returns home or stays with you
Custom Dungeons
End quest cutscene like in the Fallout games
Custom Warpaint
Custom Hair
Custom Outfits
Masks(in progress)


I'm open to suggestions as well!

LOOKING FOR:
Quest writers (Requirements: Bleach universe knowledge)
Script writers (Requirements: SKSE experience)
Voice actors (Requirements: Good microphone, at least one is able to sound at least similar to Harribel)
Someone good with 3ds Max or similar programs
Someone who can create textures
author: b133d_4_u
